doc.field: Binder "Division 1" includes operational SOPs for 1996, with other earlier procedures, later incident drills and plans, and other documents. Folder labeled "calendars" but appears to be mostly blank forms with some administrative notes with one workchart calendar for 2002. Several other folders: Division 5, P (Permanent) Circulars; Division 15 (action plans, including for West Indian Day, 2003); WTC high rise fire exercise 1999; various action plans & drills; Division 13 Covering Officer Information Booklet; Division 6 documents; Vaal Train derailment hazardous materials overview 2009; Division 3 event plans including President George W. Bush visit 2005; fire reports 2000-01; overturned fuel truck in Queens 2008 (with CDs of FDNY photos and tanker fires Powerpoint presentation); miscellaneous small files on divisions 7, 8 and 13. Final scorecard for Manhattan Borough Command Strategic Plan 2007-08. A small case with a few photo slides of buildings. (Includes digital formats)
